name: One-on-One Tutoring
description: Customized one-on-one mentoring tailored to your learning pace. Get direct guidance on any topic with flexible scheduling and focused problem-solving.

name: Full Stack Development
description: Master complete web development from frontend to backend. Learn modern frameworks, databases, and deployment with real-world projects.

name: React.js Advanced
description: Deep dive into React with advanced concepts. Master hooks, state management, performance optimization, and build production-ready applications.

name: Node.js Backend
description: Build scalable backend systems using Node.js and Express. Learn API design, authentication, databases, and server deployment.

name: AI Integration
description: Integrate artificial intelligence into your applications. Learn OpenAI APIs, chatbots, and modern AI-powered features.

name: Career Mentoring
description: Accelerate your tech career with expert guidance. Resume optimization, interview prep, portfolio building, and career strategy.

name: Project-Based Learning
description: Work on real-world projects from concept to deployment. Gain hands-on experience and build a professional portfolio.

name: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Learn modern web design principles. Create beautiful, responsive interfaces with focus on user experience and accessibility.

name: Database Design
description: Master database design and management. Learn SQL, NoSQL, optimization, and data security best practices.

name: Git & Version Control
description: Master Git and collaborative workflows. Learn branching strategies, GitHub, and professional team development practices.

name: Performance & SEO
description: Optimize web applications for speed and search visibility. Learn performance metrics, SEO strategies, and user experience optimization.

name: Cloud & DevOps
description: Deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms. Master CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and scalable infrastructure.
